alert.note: Alert for Osage; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:21AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Shawnee and northern Osage Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Delia to near Burlingame. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Topeka, Carbondale, Rossville, Tecumseh, Richland, Dover, Silver Lake, Auburn, Willard, Pauline and Berryton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 347 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 157 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
